# Fold error for individual data within one group

$$ AFE_{ij} =  \frac{1}{N_i} \sum_{j=1}^{N_i} \frac{y_{ij}}{\mu_{i}} $$

This can be rewritten as

$$ AFE = \frac{1}{N_i}  \frac{1}{\mu_i} \sum_{j=1}^{N_i} y_{ij}  $$
which can in turn be rewritten as

$$ AFE = \frac{ \bar{y}_i }{\mu_i} $$
